name: PongTrix
description:
This game is my proposition on an ISART Digital 1st year Game Design student project called "JuiceIt", where we had to recreate an arcade game (Donkey Kong, Space Invaders, Asteroids, etc...) on our own and add Juiciness to it. I tried my best adding signs and feedbacks to the fairly simple game that is Pong.

Hope I somewhat succeeded in making the game enjoyable and that you'll like playing it.

Made in under 2 days using Unity, Photoshop and Audacity.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Player 1 (on the left) uses Z and S to move upwards and downwards.

Player 2 uses Up Arrow and Down Arrow.
